titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before King Charles, March 27. 1627. Being the anniuersary of his Maiesties inauguration: by Isacc [sic] Bargraue, Doctor in Diuinity, then chaplaine to his Maiestie in attendance: and Deane of Canterbury: by His Maiesties speciall command
titleStmt.author: Bargrave, Isaac, 1586-1643.

titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before King Charles, March 27. 1627. Being the anniuersary of his Maiesties inauguration: by Isacc [sic] Bargraue, Doctor in Diuinity, then chaplaine to his Maiestie in attendance: and Deane of Canterbury: by His Maiesties speciall command
titleStmt.author: Bargrave, Isaac, 1586-1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Legatt, for Peter Paxton, and are to be sold at his shop at the Angell in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Quire A inner forme is in two settings: A3v line 1 has (1) "easy" or (2) "easie".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
